scene.name: Overview
scene.directive: After the game of strip poker, a robed figure emerges from the corner of The Inventory. Shamir briefly catches a faint shine from his cloak. It's the sigil of Lord Lonato.

Shamir was still naked from the game when the figure started to flee. Shamir wasted no time; she hurried to get dressed. Without thinking, you hand her her bow and chase after the figure, who was undoubtedly Shamir's target.

Your chase takes you to the woods. You navigate the unruly terrain for a couple of hours with Shamir hot on your heels. Without thinking of the consequences, you embark on your journey to help Shamir complete her contract. Little did you know what lewd adventures awaited you.

scene.name: Catch up
scene.directive: He went west, but I don't see any signs of trespass. No footprints. No broken twigs. No scattered leaves...
But at this rate, there's no telling how far west he went. He could be on the coast by now.
Let's catch our breath for a minute. We'll be more efficient if we wait for our stanima to come back.
Uh, Shamir? ... You are certain you saw Lord Lonato's sigil on his cloak, right?
Why are you chasing after my target with me?
What's going on between the Knights of Seiros and that rat bastard rebel is none of your concern.
You are unaffected by any of it and you gain no reward if I succeed.
So, why are you helping me?
I... I haven't thought about it.
I mean I haven't thought about it. I saw you alarmed at the man in robes and you shouted something, and...
And I just kind of ran...
I won't have the lives of innocent people caught in the crossfire of this feud between the Church and Lord Lonato.
This doesn't concern you, ~player~. Getting involved, it... it'll only make things worse.
That's not true, Shamir. Your enem-
This is Lord Lonato's territory. If any of his men spot us here, we'll have a fight on our hands. And I'm only one sniper.
Sure, I could take a few of the bastards down before they get me, but Lord Lonato has an entire army at his disposal.
You need to turn back, ~player~. I'll take you to the a. Monastery.

Taking down Lord Lonato is the business of the Knights of Seiros.
Folk like you shouldn't trouble yourselves in such matters. You're only putting yourself in danger.
We're heading back, ~player~. Before it's too late.

scene.name: Got Shot
scene.directive: Immense pain takes over. You feel a sharp pulse consume your right thigh.
You fall on your knees, then to the ground. Your eyes are closed, wincing in pain. Something irritates your thigh as you lay on your belly.
You hear Shamir, yelling. You hear a rustle in nearby bushes, followed by footsteps. They grow distant, as if fading into silence.
The rough Earth irritates your stomach, but it pales in comparison to the pain in your thigh. It grows more intense. It starts to feel warm.
You consider getting back on your feet, but the pain overwhelms you. You feel yourself slipping.
The last thing you think of as you lose consciousness

scene.name: Awakening

A pain still takes over your upper thigh, but it's managable.

You were already unconscious by the time I returned. The area wasn't safe, so I carried you east for a mile or two before setting down.
Your wound was pretty bad, ~player~. Your upper, inner thigh. There wasn't any other way I could tend to it without removing your pants, so that's what I did.

Move your dick to the left.
